entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
